StoryText: I am taking a quiz in Science class and am trying to figure out this question.
Question: Which of the following animals is NOT a mammal?

OptionResult.DiaryEntry: Bear is the wrong answer and it was also probably the most obvious choice to not pick... but I chose it anyway. And now I am mad at myself. No one else in class picked Bear. Why did I pick BEAR?!

Agh! Bat was the wrong answer? I don't know, I could've sworn those things were birds or... something else! I don't know what, but I did not think they were mammals! I wasn't the only one in class to choose this answer though. It was tricky.
Eagle was the right answer! Of course! Because eagles are birds and birds are entirely different from mammals. Still proud of myself for getting this one right.

Human is the wrong answer, this was another tricky option on the test. A few of us guessed this. I always think of us humans as different, but I suppose we are mammals just like bears and... bats too? Really? Hm, guess the right answer was eagle.
